name: More Better Balloon Juice
description: A replacement for Better Balloon Juice updated for the April 2016 redesign. Compatible with Even Betterer Balloon Juice and Troll-B-Gone. NOT COMPATIBLE with the original "Better Balloon Juice" stylesheet, so if you have it, please uninstall it before installing this one.
additional_info:
CHANGELOG
  • 20160407
    • Minor tweaks for new theme, mostly consisting of removing obsolete tweaks.
    • Consistent whitespace around comments.
    • No longer futzing with the now less-horrible footer.
    • Scroll-to-bottom arrow shoved off more to the side.
  • 20160116
    • Undid enfold.js brain damage: anchors in articles set to display:inline instead of inline-block
  • 20151119
    • Alternating comments are more gray-er-ish
    • Removed "Random Quote" header, making the section vaguely funny again
  • 20151115
    • Make author name on editable comment same as others
  • 20151114
    • Hide default featured image ("Balloon Man")
  • 20151113
    • Initial fixes for new theme.
  • 20151109
    • No longer hiding categories/tags, since they were removed from the top of posts
    • No longer repositioning post metadata since it's overlapping with nyms under some circumstances
  • 20151107
    • Specificity fixes
    • Give bottom comment proper margin
    • Prettified comment area
    • Moved reply button down so it doesn't overlap (h/t ImNotSureWhoIWantToBeYet).
  • 20151106
    • Initial version.
